items.title: 算法基础模版
items.content_html:
本篇文章为个人总结的算法模版，无序版总结，持续更新

# 设置输出小数精度（例子保留5位小数）

cout << setiosflags(ios::fixed) << setprecision(5);

# 取消同步流

ios::sync_with_stdio(0), cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);

# 大数输出不带科学计数法

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define rep(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)

int a, b;

int main() {
    cin >> a >> b;
    cout.setf(ios::fixed);    // 关键
    cout.precision(0);        // 关键
    if (pow(a, b) <= 1e9) cout << pow(a, b);
    else cout << -1;
}

这样输出就是 100000000，若不加高亮的两行输出是 1e09

# exp 和 log 函数

  • exp(n) 值为 ene^nen
  • log() 以 eee 为底（即 ln⁡\lnln）
  • log10() 以 101010 为底
#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    double a = 9, b = 10;
    cout << log(a) << endl;       // ln9
    cout << log(exp(a)) << endl;  // 9
    cout << log10(b) << endl;     // 1
    return 0;
}

自定义以 m 为底，求 log n 的值：

double a = log(n) / log(m);

示例：以 2 为底的对数函数

#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    double a = 2, b = 2;
    for (b = 2; b <= 16; b = b + 2) {
        cout << "b=" << b << "时，以2为底的对数函数=" << log(b) / log(a) << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

# reverse 翻转

reverse(s.begin(), s.end());   // 翻转整个字符串
reverse(a, a + n);             // n为数组长度，翻转整个数组

# 二分查找

P2249

while (l <= r) {
    int mid = l + (r - l) / 2;
    if (check(mid)) {
        r = mid - 1;
        ans = mid;
    } else {
        l = mid + 1;
    }
}

# 并查集

P3367

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int n, m;
int r[10001];
int fa[10001];

void init(int n) {
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
        fa[i] = i;
        r[i] = 1;
    }
}

// 查找根节点（路径压缩）
int find(int x) {
    return x == fa[x] ? x : (fa[x] = find(fa[x]));
}

// 合并（按秩合并）
inline void merge(int i, int j) {
    int x = find(i), y = find(j);
    if (r[x] <= r[y])
        fa[x] = y;
    else
        fa[y] = x;
    if (r[x] == r[y] && x != y)
        r[y]++;  // 如果深度相同且根节点不同，则新的根节点的深度+1
}

int main() {
    cin >> n >> m;
    init(n);
    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
        int t, x, y;
        cin >> t >> x >> y;
        if (t == 1) merge(x, y);
        else {
            if (find(x) == find(y)) cout << "Y" << endl;
            else cout << "N" << endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

# Manacher（字符串中的最长回文子串）

P3805

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int p[33000001];

int manacher(string s) {
    string st = "$#";
    for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {
        st += s[i];
        st += "#";
    }
    int mid = 0, r = 0, ans = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i < st.size(); i++) {
        p[i] = r > i ? min(p[mid * 2 - i], r - i) : 1;
        while (st[i - p[i]] == st[i + p[i]]) p[i]++;
        if (p[i] > ans) ans = p[i];
        if (i + p[i] > r) {
            r = i + p[i];
            mid = i;
        }
    }
    return ans - 1;
}

int main() {
    string s;
    cin >> s;
    cout << manacher(s);
    return 0;
}

# KMP

P3375

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int Next[1000002];
string s1, s2;

void get_Next(string s) {
    s += "#";
    Next[0] = -1;
    int k = -1, i = 0, l = s.size();
    while (i < l) {
        if (s[i] == s[k] || k == -1) {
            i++;
            k++;
            Next[i] = k;
        } else {
            k = Next[k];
        }
    }
}

void kmp(string s1, string s2) {
    int l1 = s1.size(), l2 = s2.size();
    int i = 0, j = 0;
    while (j < l1) {
        if (s2[i] == s1[j]) {
            i++;
            j++;
            if (i == l2) {           // 完全匹配
                cout << j - l2 + 1 << endl;
                i = Next[i - 1] + 1; // 继续匹配
            }
        } else {
            if (i == 0) j++;              // 如果在首位不匹配
            else i = Next[i - 1] + 1;     // 跳转
        }
    }
}

int main() {
    cin >> s1 >> s2;
    get_Next(s2);
    kmp(s1, s2);
    for (int i = 1; i <= s2.size(); i++) cout << Next[i] << " ";
    return 0;
}

# 拓扑排序

P1113

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

vector<int> edge[10001];  // 存储当前节点指向结点
int tim[10001], ind[10001] = {0}, f[10001] = {0};  // 时间，入度，答案
int n;
queue<int> q;

int main() {
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        int w;
        cin >> w;
        cin >> tim[i];
        int p;
        cin >> p;
        while (p) {
            edge[p].push_back(i);
            ind[i]++;
            cin >> p;
        }
    }

    // 寻找最开始入度就是0的点，入列
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        if (!ind[i]) {
            q.push(i);
            f[i] = tim[i];
        }
    }

    // 找每一个队列中的点的相邻节点
    while (!q.empty()) {
        int temp = q.front();
        q.pop();
        int l = edge[temp].size();
        for (int i = 0; i < l; i++) {
            ind[edge[temp][i]]--;
            if (!ind[edge[temp][i]]) q.push(edge[temp][i]);
            f[edge[temp][i]] = max(f[edge[temp][i]], f[temp] + tim[edge[temp][i]]);
        }
    }

    int ans = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        ans = max(ans, f[i]);
    }
    cout << ans;
    return 0;
}

# 树状数组

# 单点修改，区间查询（维护原数组）

P3374

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define lowbit(x) (x & (-x))
using namespace std;

const int N = 2000006;
int c[N] = {0};
int n, m;

// 单点修改
void change_onepoint(int ind, int k) {
    for (int i = ind; i <= n; i += lowbit(i)) c[i] += k;
}

// 区间查询
void search(int l, int r) {
    long long ans = 0;
    for (int i = r; i; i -= lowbit(i)) ans += c[i];
    for (int i = l - 1; i; i -= lowbit(i)) ans -= c[i];
    cout << ans << endl;
}

int main() {
    cin >> n >> m;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        int t;
        cin >> t;
        change_onepoint(i, t);
    }
    while (m--) {
        int t, x, y;
        cin >> t >> x >> y;
        if (t == 1) change_onepoint(x, y);
        else search(x, y);
    }
    return 0;
}

# 区间修改，单点查询（维护差分数组）

P3368（区间用单点，单点用区间）

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define lowbit(x) (x & (-x))
using namespace std;

const int N = 1000006;
int c[N] = {0};       // 树状数组
int a[N] = {0};       // 原数组
int chafen[N] = {0};  // 差分数组
int n, m;

// 对差分数组的单点修改
void change_onepoint(int ind, int k) {
    for (int i = ind; i <= n; i += lowbit(i)) c[i] += k;
}

// 对差分数组的区间查询，其实就是求原数组的单点值
void search(int r) {
    long long ans = 0;
    for (int i = r; i; i -= lowbit(i)) ans += c[i];
    cout << ans << endl;
}

int main() {
    cin >> n >> m;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        cin >> a[i];
        chafen[i] = a[i] - a[i - 1];
        change_onepoint(i, chafen[i]);
    }
    while (m--) {
        int t;
        cin >> t;
        if (t == 1) {
            int x, y, k;
            cin >> x >> y >> k;
            change_onepoint(x, k);
            change_onepoint(y + 1, -k);
        } else {
            int k;
            cin >> k;
            search(k);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

# 区间修改，区间查询（超级树状数组）

P3372（本来是线段树的板子，用超级树状数组做）

对于 a 的树状数组（差分）tree，建立一个新的树状数组 tree1 使得：

tree1[i] = tree[i] * (i - 1)

之后，x 到 y 的区间和即为：

(y * getsum(tree, y) - (x-1) * getsum(tree, x-1)) - (getsum(tree1, y) - getsum(tree1, x-1))

Tips: 因为求区间和满足区间加法，所以 Sum(L,R) = Sum(1,R) - Sum(1,L-1)，所以有上述公式。

# 最小生成树（Prim）

P3366（可以囊括两节点之间有多条路径的情况）P1194 P1396

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int n, m, a, b, v, cnt = 0;

struct Edge {
    int fr, to, l;
    explicit Edge(int aa = 0, int bb = 0, int vv = 0) {
        fr = aa; to = bb; l = vv;
    }
    bool operator<(const Edge& o) const {
        return this->l > o.l;
    }
};

vector<Edge> graph[100010];
bool flag[100010];  // flag[i]==true means node i is in tree
Edge tree[100010];

void Prim() {
    priority_queue<Edge> pq;
    flag[1] = true;
    for (Edge e : graph[1]) {
        pq.push(e);
    }
    while (cnt < n - 1 && !pq.empty()) {
        Edge top = pq.top();
        pq.pop();
        if (flag[top.to]) continue;  // 当前节点已经使用过
        flag[top.to] = true;
        tree[cnt++] = top;
        for (Edge e : graph[top.to]) {
            if (!flag[e.to]) {
                pq.push(e);
            }
        }
    }
}

int main() {
    scanf("%d %d", &n, &m);
    for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
        cin >> a >> b >> v;
        Edge e1(a, b, v), e2(b, a, v);
        graph[a].push_back(e1);
        graph[b].push_back(e2);
    }
    Prim();
    if (cnt < n - 1) {
        printf("orz");
        return 0;
    }
    int ans = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) {
        Edge e = tree[i];
        ans += e.l;
    }
    printf("%d", ans);
    return 0;
}

# 最短路径（Dijkstra）

P1359（用最小生成树改造的模板）

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int n, v;

struct Edge {
    int fr, to, l;
    explicit Edge(int aa = 0, int bb = 0, int vv = 0) {
        fr = aa; to = bb; l = vv;
    }
    bool operator<(const Edge& o) const {
        return this->l > o.l;
    }
};

vector<Edge> graph[100010];
bool flag[210] = {0};
int dis[210];
const int INF = 1e9;

void Dijkstra() {
    flag[1] = 1;
    int u = 1;
    int mi = INF, s = -1;
    for (Edge e : graph[1]) {
        dis[e.to] = e.l;
        if (dis[e.to] < mi) {
            mi = dis[e.to];
            s = e.to;
        }
    }
    u = s;
    while (!flag[n]) {
        for (Edge e : graph[u]) {
            dis[e.to] = min(dis[e.to], dis[u] + e.l);
        }
        mi = INF;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            if (!flag[i] && dis[i] < mi) {
                mi = dis[i];
                s = i;
            }
        }
        if (s == -1) {
            cout << "NO WAY";
            return;  // 所有未访问节点都不可达
        }
        u = s;
        flag[u] = 1;
    }
}

int main() {
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) {
        for (int j = i + 1; j <= n; j++) {
            cin >> v;
            Edge e(i, j, v);
            graph[i].push_back(e);
        }
    }
    fill(dis, dis + n + 1, 1000001);
    Dijkstra();
    cout << dis[n];
    return 0;
}

# GCD（最大公约数）

int gcd(int x, int y) {
    int temp;
    while (y != 0) {
        temp = x % y;
        x = y;
        y = temp;
    }
    return x;
}

# DFS 搜索（连通块计数）

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int dx[8] = {0, 0, -1, 1, -1, 1, 1, -1};
int dy[8] = {1, -1, 0, 0, 1, 1, -1, -1};
int r, c;
char maps[110][110];

void dfs(int x, int y) {
    if (x < 0 || x > r + 1 || y < 0 || y > c + 1 || maps[x][y] != 'W') return;
    maps[x][y] = '*';
    for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
        dfs(x + dx[i], y + dy[i]);
    }
}

int main() {
    cin >> r >> c;
    for (int i = 1; i <= r; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= c; j++) {
            cin >> maps[i][j];
        }
    }
    int ans = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= r; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= c; j++) {
            if (maps[i][j] == 'W') {
                ans++;
                dfs(i, j);
            }
        }
    }
    cout << ans;
    return 0;
}

# 01背包

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int f[20001];
int w[31];

int main() {
    int V, n;
    cin >> V >> n;
    f[0] = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> w[i];
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        for (int j = V; j >= w[i]; j--) {
            if (f[j] < f[j - w[i]] + w[i]) f[j] = f[j - w[i]] + w[i];
        }
    }
    cout << V - f[V];
    return 0;
}

items.title: Hello World
items.content_html:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

# Quick Start

# Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

# Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

# Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

# Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
